thread.title: BRIEF-Trex Company Posts Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.62

title: BRIEF-Trex Company Posts Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.62
text: February 21, 2018 / 9:15 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Trex Company Posts Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.62 Reuters Staff Feb 21 (Reuters) - Trex Company Inc: * TREX COMPANY REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.62 * SEES Q1 2018 SALES $172 MILLION * Q4 SALES ROSE 28 PERCENT TO $122 MILLION * TREX COMPANY - APPROVED NEW SHARE REPURCHASE PROGRAM UNDER WHICH COMPANY MAY REPURCHASE UP TO 2.9 MILLION SHARES OF COMPANYâ€˜S OUTSTANDING COMMON STOCK. * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.54, REVENUE VIEW $118.4 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q1 REVENUE VIEW $171.9 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
